{"step_by_step_thinking": "Cholesterol is a type of lipid, but not all lipids are cholesterol, so option B is not correct. Lipoproteins are proteins that transport cholesterol in the blood, but they are not a form of cholesterol, so option A is not correct. The physiological active form of cholesterol is free cholesterol, which is not bound to proteins and can interact with cells and participate in various biological processes.", "answer_choice": "C"}
